1.post_text:
Having trouble staying awake for the World Cup Finals? Here are our tips for you!

Stimulate your senses! Expose yourself to bright lights, and listen to some upbeat music at the same time! Even better, get on your feet and dance to the beat!

Just make sure you're not listening to slow jazz or anything that might make you even sleepier!

location.street: 1 Jurong West Central 2, #03-07 Jurong Point Shopping Centre

comments.message:
1) Brazil and Germany
2) my favourite moment is watching Suarez biting the other player Lol! ;)

1. Germany v Argentina
2. Ilhan Mansiz of Turkey performing the rainbow flick against Roberto Carlos in 2002 World Cup. It mocks and shows the Brazilians that not only them are capable of executing these kind of skills. It caught out Roberto Carlos as well and eventually draws him into a foul.

1) Brazil and Germany
2) my favourite moment is watching Suarez falling into the arm of other player :)

1. Brazil Vs Argentina
2. My Favourite World Cup Moment is During this 2014 in Brazil because Luis Suarez was Banned for 4mth for Sinking his teeth to Italy player Giorgio Chiellini,Suarez aleast should given SunSnack to Bite before the Match :D

1. Brazil vs Netherlands
2. Maradona's hand of god goal

1. Germany and Holland
2. Favourite moment is the flying Dutchman header Robin Van Persie against Spain

1. Germany and Argentina
2. My favorite world cup moment is Robben become the fastest player in world cup.. sprinter sia !

1. Brazil vs Argentina in the finals

2. Netherlands' goal keeper Tim Krul came onto the field after 120 minutes, saved two penalties in a shootout win over Costa Rica and sending the Dutch into the semi-finals this year. Post-match, Krul had commented that "it's a dream, it's unbelievable."

Well, that dream did came true and was witnessed live by millions of spectators/audience worldwide. And that, for me, is truly my most favourite World Cup moment!

Germany vs Argentina. My favorite World Cup moment of all time was Brazil’s David Luiz urging the crowd to acknowledge Colombia’s James Rodriguez for a stellar World Cup performance because that's true sportsmanship.

1. Brazil & Argentina. 
2. My favourite World Cup moment is this year in Brazil 2014 because I'd won lots of World Cups goodies in a separate lucky draws conducted by various companies in Singapore.

1. Germany and Argentina
2. My favorite world cup moment is when Juan kneed down Neymar but Brazil is still able to get into the semi finals

Brazil vs Argentina.  Best moment is when Tim Krul was substituted into play at 120th min by Louis van Gaal for the penalty shootout against Costa Rica. Simply a tactical genius as Tim Krul went on to save fantastic efforts and prove his saving prowess also at Newcastle.

1.Germany vs Argentina
2.1986 quater finals between France and Brazil.The clash of epic proportions and one to savour for years to come!
Brazil & Argentina!
Brazil & Germany . Best world cup moment is this year because it a excited match for all & it the best time we gather with friends & family for cheering our favourite team :)

1. Brazil and Netherlands will face off against each other in the World Cup Finals this year.
2. My favorite World Cup moment is Brazil! Brazil is the host country and the team that wins the most World Cup in the world! Who can beat Brazil??? :-P

Brazil and Netherlands. 
Watching James Rodriguez score his sixth & last goal for this world cup. I hope he becomes the top scorer.

1. Brazil and Netherlands will face off against each other in the World Cup Finals this year.

 2. My favorite World Cup moment is Netherlands managed to crawl back from 1 goal down to rob Mexico the Quarter-finals berth by scoring 2 late goals in the final few minutes to win Mexico 2-1.
1) Brazil vs Argentina 2) Brazil and Mexico got a match together 0 - 0. Mexico goalkeeper was so good in blocking brazil from the goal. It was so exciting hoping brazil getting at least a goal!
Netherlands vs Germany. It's got to be when Roberto baggio blasted the penalty over the bar to give Brazil the World Cup win in the 1994 World Cup.

1) Brazil & Argentina .                                   2) My favourite World Cup moments was this year because it a excited moment of which my family & I go watch the soccer match & cheering for our favourite team.
Brazil and Germany

Brazil and Netherlands
My favourite world cup moment of all time is when Robin Van Persie scored a diving header in Holland's first game in this year's world cup. It's also memorable because it is one of the most entertaining match with lots of goal and virtually knocked Spain out of the World Cup.

1) Brazil vs Argentina     2) Favorite moment is in World Cup 1986, Argentina captain Diego Maradona scored the "Hand of God" goal, as well as another voted "Goal of the Century", in the same quarter-final against England.

1.Germany vs Argentina
2. Maradona's goal of the century against england in 1986 because it is stupendous to watch!

4.post_text:
Answer the following 2 questions in the COMMENTS below, and you could win yourself 1 carton of 25% Less Sugar and 3 boxes of Sunsnack products, the great tasting snack made from sunflower kernel coated with a layer of roasted cereal!  

1. Which teams will face off against each other in the World Cup Finals this year?

2. Which was your favorite World Cup moment of all time, and why?

Submit your entries by 11:59PM on 8 July! 3 Lucky winners with the correct answer will be selected randomly on 10 July. Good luck!

5.post_text: Football and donuts: the perfect combination for any World Cup fan! Round it off with an ice-cold can of Red Bull and get yourself pumped up for the final matches of the 2014 World Cup!

9.post_text:
Having trouble staying awake this World Cup Season? Here are our tips for you!

Take a power nap for 20-30 minutes! Grabbing some shut-eye during the day can give you the necessary boost to keep yourself going for just that much longer at night! 

Just don't get caught napping at work! Lunch break would be an ideal time to do this, so grab some rest when you can!

10.post_text:
We are nearing the climax of 2014 FIFA World Cup! Which 4 teams do you think will qualify for the World Cup Semi-finals?

Post your 4 selected teams in the COMMENTS below, and you could win yourself 1 carton of 25% Less Sugar and 3 boxes of Sunsnacks* products, the great tasting snack made from sunflower kernel coated with a layer of roasted cereal!  

Hurry and submit your entries by 11:59PM on 4 July! 4 lucky winners with the correct answer will be selected at random on 6 July! Good luck!

(*Sunsnacks are available exclusively at Sheng Siong outlets)

20.post_text:
Having trouble staying awake this World Cup Season? 

If you really have to munch on something during the night, try having some spicy food!

The chemical compounds found in chilli and peppers are known to raise body temperature, increase heart rate, and raise your metabolism!

Just don't overdo it, and keep some Red Bull handy just in case!

23.post_text:
The boys from Heart2Climb wish to express their sincere gratitude to Red Bull Singapore for supporting their challenging endeavor. 

There were numerous occasions when the hostile conditions sapped their wills and strength, but Red Bull 25% Less Sugar provided them with the much needed boost in mental faculty and physical endurance. 

To quote the both of them: Fuel yourself with Red Bull as you scale your own life's challenges!
